programmes.show_description: SBC have captured the essences of plants to soothe your body. Tune in to find out how your skin can benefit from their renowned natural gel formulations.

Our expert guests are here to introduce you to our cutting-edge range of 'grown-up gadgets'. Whether you're into cameras, music or gaming, it's all here from the biggest names.
SBC have captured the essences of plants to soothe your body. Tune in to find out how your skin can benefit from their renowned natural gel formulations.
Wake up to QVC! We've chosen products from across all our ranges to ensure there is something for everyone to enjoy. Tune in to see special guests too.
First established over 150 years ago, join reputable gardening brand de Jager as they share high quality plants and bulbs in all shapes and sizes, to help you create your dream outdoor space.
QVC Food Hall brings you a show packed full of delicious treats from some of your most loved food brands at QVC. Sweet or savoury, we'll have something to tempt your taste buds in this show.
Refresh your beauty collection with the award-winning formulas from SBC. From skincare to bodycare, discover moisturising gels, body washes, oils and more.
Join us as we showcase products that help people with reduced mobility enjoy an active lifestyle. From mobility scooters to sound amplifiers, our range can help people improve their quality of life.
Discover fashion from Izabel London. This inclusive brand caters to sizes 8 - 26 and features designs for the trend-conscious fashion fan shopping for everything from everyday style to holiday looks.
Refresh your beauty collection with the award-winning formulas from SBC. From skincare to bodycare, discover moisturising gels, body washes, oils and more.
Laura Geller is a renowned make-up artist, teacher and working mother and the creative force behind one of the most successful make-up studios in New York. Join us to explore her superb range.
Discover the latest in fashion with ONLY. From trendy dresses and stylish jeans to chic jackets, ONLY offers fashion for all ages and sizes!
SBC have captured the essences of plants to soothe your body. Tune in to find out how your skin can benefit from their renowned natural gel formulations.
Discover sophistication with the Effy Jewellery Collection. Handcrafted in New York, each piece mixes stunning gemstones with 18ct gold, offering enduring beauty and elegance.
Refresh your wardrobe with Denim & Co's spring fashion. Discover stylish, easy-to-wear pieces perfect for the season's fresh start.

Refresh your wardrobe with ONLY Fashion. Discover effortless, on-trend pieces perfect for everyday styling and easy confidence, whatever your plans.
Join us to see Denim & Co's clothing range offering trend-focused pieces combined with timeless style and chic choices for your smart or casual looks.

Wake up to QVC! We've chosen products from across all our ranges to ensure there is something for everyone to enjoy. Tune in to see special guests too.
Join Katy and our trusted stylists and fashion experts as we help you create your perfect wardrobe, showing you how to bring key pieces and different looks together to showcase your personal style.
Grow your own with Suttons. Discover seeds, plants, and expert tips to start your gardening journey and enjoy fresh, homegrown produce all season long.
Look after yourself with our showcase of exercise equipment, supplements, meal plans and other tools to help you maintain a healthy lifestyle.
Discover a range of bath, body and home products from Provence, formulated with natural ingredients such as olive, verbena, lavender and shea butter.
Transform your wardrobe with the latest trends from Denim & Co. and discover how to style them in this show. Get ready to enliven your look this season!
Tune in to see the modern and sophisticated Finery London womenswear range, with a focus on stylish detail and beautiful fabrics to make sure your wardrobe reflects your individuality.
Nakery Beauty delivers clean, high-performance skincare and bodycare designed to empower confidence at every age.
Indulge yourself in our collection of fine, exquisite jewellery. Each piece in our glamorous selection epitomises the height of luxury. Go on, you deserve it!
Discover Biotech Beauty hosted by Alison Young and learn how science can help you unlock your radiance. With experts Oskia, as well as NAD+ formulas from Pai and more, you won't want to miss it!

Prai is a ginger-like root that has been harvested in the tropical forests of Thailand for more than 1000 years. This range of prestige skincare combines traditional wisdom with the latest technology.
Join us to see Denim & Co's clothing range offering trend-focused pieces combined with timeless style and chic choices for your smart or casual looks.
